function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Negative psychosocial and economic effects of covid-19 pandemic","category":"Family","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty in enforcement of quarantine and economic support measures","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of social support for at-risk and vulnerable groups","category":"Family","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Psychological effects of the covid-19 epidemic","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of economic interventions for impoverished households","category":"Family","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate social support for vulnerable and at-risk groups","category":"Family","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher covid-19 cases and mortality rates in socially vulnerable groups","category":"Family","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of social support to control the epidemic","category":"Family","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccessibility of psychological interventions in some regions","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited financial resources and low access to comprehensive health care in LMICs","category":"Family","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited access to comprehensive information due to language and search engine restrictions","category":"Person","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Uncertainty and unpredictability of the future of the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Family","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of virus by asymptomatic individuals","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinformation and confusion about the efficacy of drugs for covid-19 treatment","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Delayed development and evaluation of safe and effective treatments","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 as a global threat","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global shortage of essential medical supplies","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of influenza a h1n1 and human adenovirus","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of sars-cov-2","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited understanding of biosensor terminology among environmental audience","category":"Visitors","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Endogenous biomarkers present in sewage systems can be used to estimate the real-time population served by the system, posing a risk of privacy invasion.","category":"Organization","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The identification and monitoring of disease biomarkers in sewage systems could lead to the unintentional disclosure of health information of entire populations.","category":"Organization","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proteomic identification of disease biomarkers in sewage systems may lead to the unintentional tracking and monitoring of health conditions of different populations, potentially violating privacy and ethical standards.","category":"Organization","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Discrepancies between laboratories due to factors such as qpcr platforms, pcr inhibitors, nucleic acid extraction efficiency, and low levels of targets","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of standardization in laboratory protocols for detecting sars-cov-2 and determining viral content","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate adaptation of clinical technology to WBE","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Small market size for environmental biosensors","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of optimization in wastewater treatment technology for virus transmission control","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Approval and widespread use of various POCT systems","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global environmental changes such as climate change and ecosystem shifts altering the thresholds of the planet","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of the complex ways in which global changes affect human, animal, and natural systems","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Continued high incidence and distribution of vectorborne diseases VBDs","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Vector-borne diseases and zoonotic diseases are implicated, disproportionately impacting people in tropical climates with inadequate access to health services, poor housing, weak governance structures, and socio-economic underdevelopment.","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uneven distribution of progress in tackling vector-borne diseases VBDs across the world and across all diseases.","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Emerging vector-borne diseases, such as zika virus ZIKV and chikungunya CHIK , have infected millions and are linked to neurological and developmental disorders in infants.","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Over-emphasis on technology and biomedical expertise","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Underdeveloped thematic areas for VBDs: community participation, citizen engagement, social differentiation, and wider system dynamics","category":"Participation","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for vulnerability, resilience, adaption, and community-based approaches","category":"Participation","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Increased vector densities and geographical spread due to climate change","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of understanding the impacts of global change on vector-borne diseases","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate community-based approaches for vector-borne disease strategies","category":"Participation","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Wide variation in level of detail provided in adaptation plans","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of attention to education and community participation","category":"Participation","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of emphasis on hygiene and sanitation in community-based adaptation initiatives","category":"Participation","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of community-based studies for mitigating the effects of climate change on VBDs","category":"Participation","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited mandate on public health","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misjudging public health status","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Politicization of public health measures","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited EU mandate on public health","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited EU mandate in public health","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"}]}
